text: lkn la haraj ealaykum 'an tadkhuluu bighayr astydhan bywtana laysat mukhasasat lskna 'unas bdhathm, bal lytmte biha man yahtaj 'iilayha kalbywt almueaddat sadaqat liaibn alsabil fi turuq almusafirin wghyrha min almrafq, ffyha manafie whajt liman ydkhlha, wafi alastydhan mshq. wallah yaelam 'ahwalikum alzzahirat walkhfyt
